hymn.title: To Calv'ry let our eyes be turned
hymn.category: The Way of the Cross—Turning to the Cross

layout.singingstanza: To Cal -- v'ry let our eyes be turned, With Cal -- v'ry love our hearts be burned; For there in Cal -- v'ry's aw -- ful hour, Love con -- quered sin and Sa -- tan's pow'r.

hymn.copyright: From WINGS, Part 1, S.P.C.K., London, 1960. Used by permission of The Dohnavur Fellowship.

lyrics.stanza: To Calv'ry let our eyes be turned, With Calv'ry love our hearts be burned; For there in Calv'ry's awful hour, Love conquered sin and Satan's pow'r.
